settings.popup_text:
As the situation around new tariffs continues to evolve, diamond pricing across the industry is under pressure. While we are doing our best to absorb these increases and minimize the impact on our customers, please be aware that price changes may occur at any time.

We truly appreciate your continued support and understanding during this time.

settings.heading: Confirm your age
settings.decline_text: Sorry, the content of this store can't be seen by a younger audience. Come back when you're older.
